meanings.definition: A shoulder ornament, especially a fringed strap worn on military uniforms.
meanings.sent1: The soldier proudly displayed his epaule on his uniform.
meanings.sent2: The epaule added a touch of elegance to the military attire.
meanings.sent3: The epaule on the uniform made the soldier look very official.
meanings.sent4: Her epaule was like a badge of honor, symbolizing her rank.
meanings.sent5: The shiny epaule caught everyone's attention, gleaming in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The fortress had a strong epaule to defend against attacks.
meanings.sent2: The epaule of the bastion overlooked the surrounding landscape.
meanings.sent3: The epaule of the fortress was like a protective shield.
meanings.sent4: The enemy's cannons aimed at the vulnerable epaule of the bastion.
meanings.sent5: The ancient epaule of the bastion stood as a testament to its strength.
